template.name: Template SNMP UPS Crown CMUOA-350
template.description: A Template for monitoring UPS SNMP cards Crown SNMP-MCY-EN (Powerwalker SNMP web pro 1.1). Used with Crown CMUOA-350 UPS. Created by Evgeny. b@m-oil.ru

item.name: Ups Bat Estimated Charge Remaining
item.description: An estimate of the battery charge remaining expressed as a percent of full charge.

item.name: Ups Battery Number in parallel
item.description: The number of battery in Parallel.

item.name: Ups Battery Number in series
item.description: The number of battery in series.

item.name: Ups Bat Seconds On Battery
item.description: If the unit is on battery power, the elapsed time since the UPS last switched to battery power, or the time since the network management subsystem was last restarted, whichever is less. -1 shall be returned if the unit is not on battery power.

item.name: Ups Battery Status
item.description: The indication of the status in the UPS system's batteries.

valuemap.name: UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups Battery Status

item.name: Ups Battery Temperature
item.description: The ambient temperature at or near the UPS Battery casing.

item.name: Ups Battery Current
item.description: The positive battery present current.

item.name: Ups Battery Voltage
item.description: The magnitude of the present Positive battery voltage.

item.name: Ups ID Manufacturer
item.description: The name of the UPS manufacturer.

item.name: Ups ID Model Name
item.description: The UPS Model designation.

item.name: Ups ID Name
item.description: A string identifying the UPS. This object should be set by the administrator.

item.name: Ups ID Protocol
item.description: The UPS Protocol id.

valuemap.name: UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups id protocol

item.name: Ups ID Serial Number
item.description: The UPS serial no.

item.name: Ups ID Ups Type
item.description: UPS type.

valuemap.name: UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups id type

item.name: Ups ID FW Version
item.description: Main CPU firmware version.

item.name: Ups In Line bads
item.description: A count of the number of times the input entered an out-of-tolerance condition as defined by the manufacturer. This count is incremented by one each time the input transitions from zero out-of-tolerance lines to one or more input lines out-of-tolerance. P.S. This field shows number of faults between SNMP requests.

item.name: UPS Output Current Line 0
item.description: The output current of the UPS system

item.name: UPS Output Frequency
item.description: The current output frequency of the UPS system

item.name: UPS Output Voltage Line 0
item.description: The output voltage of the UPS system.

item.name: Ups Rating Voltage
item.description: The rating input voltage of UPS

item.name: Ups Ratout Apparent Power
item.description: The rating output apparent power of UPS

item.name: Ups Ratout Frequency
item.description: The rating output frequency of UPS

item.name: Ups Ratout True Power
item.description: The rating output true power of UPS

item.name: Ups Ratout Voltage
item.description: The rating output voltage of UPS

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP UPS Crown CMUOA-350:ups.in.frequency.0.avg(90)}<49 or {Template SNMP UPS Crown CMUOA-350:ups.in.frequency.0.avg(90)}>51
trigger.name: Input frequency is not stable on {HOST.NAME}

value_map.name: UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups Battery Status
UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups id protocol
UPS Crown CMUOA-350 Ups id type
